titleStmt.title: A continuation, or second part, of the most pleasant and delightful history of Reynard the fox containing much matter of pleasure and content : written for the delight of young men, pleasure of the aged and profit of all : to which is added many excellent morals.
Reynard the Fox. English.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for Edward Brewster ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
